quote: A misadventure is an act that has a safer, less self-detrimental, less interesting alternative. But you choose that act because you want to do something memorable and worthy of discussion.
quote_letters: A MISADVENTURE IS AN ACT THAT HAS A SAFER LESS SELF-DETRIMENTAL LESS INTERESTING ALTERNATIVE BUT YOU CHOOSE THAT ACT BECAUSE YOU WANT TO DO SOMETHING MEMORABLE AND WORTHY OF DISCUSSION
